scripts.patch-push: npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package*.json && git commit -m 'patch update' && git push --set-upstream origin $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.minor-push: npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && git add package*.json && git commit -m 'minor update' && git push --set-upstream origin $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.major-push: npm --no-git-tag-version version major && git add package*.json && git commit -m 'major update' && git push --set-upstream origin $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.deploy: npm run build --base='/yumeangelica.github.io/' && echo 'app built' && ./deploy.sh && echo 'app deployed to github pages'
